summary: The strange history of the now abandoned American 1993-bill, «Don't ask, don't tell» where sexual orientation was a "non-talk" policy in the American forces, leading to 13.368 getting kicked out before 2011.
cast: Carl Levin|Robert Gates|Mike Mullen|John McCain|Joe Lieberman|Nathaniel Frank|Aaron Belkin|Alan Steinman|Gore Vidal|Dixon Osbourn|Lawrence Korb|Leonard Matlovich|Margarethe Cammermeyer|Bill Clinton|Norman Schwarzkopf|Dick Cheney|Phil Gramm|Sam Nunn|John Warner|Fred Peck|Colin Powell|Barney Frank|Daniel R. Coats|David Marlowe|William Henderson|Charles Moskos|Joe Steffan|Tracy Thorne|Strom Thurmond|Emily Hecht|Aubrey Sarvis|George W. Bush|Patrick Murphy|Mike Almy|Victor Fehrenbach|Barack Obama|Joe Sestak|Dan Choi|Kirsten Gillibrand|Jeh Johnson|Claire McCaskill|David Hall|Lindsey Graham|Evan Bayh|John Blair|Drew Forni|John Hutson|Randy Jones|Alex Nicholson
keywords: don't ask don't tell|u.s. house of representatives|u.s. senate|senate hearing|time magazine
title: Ni se pregunta ni se cuenta
